value.title: Power BI Premium Query Profiling with DAX Studio and SQL Profiler

value.title: Setting default values using COALESCE in DAX
value.excerpt: Learn how to get default values using the DAX COALESCE function instead of IF statements. A great way to avoid BLANK in Power BI! value.title: Tracing your DAX queries in Power BI

value.title: How to use AddColumns function in DAX and Power BI
value.excerpt: AddColumns is a DAX function that is helpful often when writing calculations in Power BI. In this article and video, I‚Äôll explain how you can use it to add calculated columns on the fly to the virtual tables in measures or directly in a table. download the Power BI file from my blog article here: https://radacad.com/how-to-use-addcolumns-function-in-dax-and-power-bi

value.title: Power BI DAX RelatedTable Function   Get the subtable related to the current row
value.excerpt: There are multiple functions that can help when you work with tables that are connected through relationships. One of these functions is Relatedtable. value.title: Letter case sensitivity in DAX, Power BI and Analysis Services
value.excerpt: Power BI and Analysis Services are case-insensitive by default. Lowercase letters are identical to uppercase letters. This is mostly a good choice, but it also comes with unexpected consequences. In this video, we run through a set of queries to understand what to be aware of when working with a mixture

value.title: Mark as Date Table in Power BI
